AbsoluteOrientationSensor.summary: The AbsoluteOrientationSensor interface of the Sensor APIs describes the device's physical orientation in relation to the Earth's reference coordinate system.

remarks.para: To use this sensor, the user must grant permission to the 'accelerometer', 'gyroscope', and 'magnetometer' device sensors through the Permissions API.
This feature may be blocked by a Permissions Policy set on your server.
